mapper.select: SELECT SNRO_NO AS CODE , SNRO_NM AS TEXT FROM TSY_SNRO_SET_MNG WHERE SNRO_KIND_C = '02' AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY SNRO_NO, SNRO_NM

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT ORG_CLAS_C AS ORG_CLAS_C /*기관분류코드 */ , ACCT_C AS ACCT_C /*계정코드 */ , AC_BUSI_TC AS AC_BUSI_TC /*회계사업구분코드 */ , CASE WHEN RATE_SSTV_YN = 'N' THEN '비금리부' ELSE '금리부' END AS RATE_SSTV_NM /*금리민감여부 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN RATE_SNRO_NO = '1' THEN TRM_INT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS AMT_1 /*Flat */ , SUM(CASE WHEN RATE_SNRO_NO = '2' THEN TRM_INT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS AMT_2 /*평행이동_UP_100 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN RATE_SNRO_NO = '3' THEN TRM_INT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS AMT_3 /*평행이동_DOWN_100 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN RATE_SNRO_NO = '4' THEN TRM_INT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS AMT_4 /*탄성치_UP_100 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN RATE_SNRO_NO = '5' THEN TRM_INT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS AMT_5 /*탄성치_DOWN_100 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN RATE_SNRO_NO = '13' THEN TRM_INT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS AMT_13 /*통계예측 */
, DIMENSION1
, DIMENSION2
FROM ( SELECT A.ORG_CLAS_C AS ORG_CLAS_C , A.ACCT_C AS ACCT_C /*계정코드*/
, A.AC_BUSI_TC AS AC_BUSI_TC /*회계사업구분코드*/
, '1105' AS AC_BUSI_TC /*전체 합산, 계정마스터와 조인용*/
, A.RATE_SSTV_YN AS RATE_SSTV_YN /*금리민감여부*/ , A.RATE_SNRO_NO AS RATE_SNRO_NO /*금리시나리오번호*/ , SUM(A.TRM_INT_AMT) AS TRM_INT_AMT /*기간이자금액*/
, A.${DIMENSION1} AS DIMENSION1
, A.${DIMENSION2} AS DIMENSION2
FROM TRT_NII_RSLT_TOT A /*보고서_NII결과집계*/ WHERE A.BASE_DATE = TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{BASE_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDD')), 'YYYYMMDD') /*기준년월*/ AND A.ALM_WORK_TC = 'M' /*ALM작업구분코드*/ AND A.ORG_CLAS_C = #{ORG_CLAS_C} /*기관분류코드*/ AND A.ASTS_SDTP_CLAS_C = '10' /*자산건전성분류코드 */ AND A.NEW_CAP_QTY_TC = #{NEW_CAP_QTY_TC} /*신규자금량구분코드*/ AND A.CAP_QTY_SNRO_NO = #{CAP_QTY_SNRO_NO} /*자금량시나리오번호*/ AND A.RATE_SNRO_NO IN ('1','2','3','4','5','13') /*금리시나리오번호*/ AND A.CS_BHOR_REFL_YN = #{CS_BHOR_REFL_YN} /*고객행동*/ AND A.FUTU_POT_SECT_CNT = 0 /*미래시점구간수 0으로 고정*/
AND A.AC_BUSI_TC = #{AC_BUSI_TC} /*회계사업구분코드*/
AND A.BR_C IN (SELECT BR_C FROM TTL_BR_C_INFO WHERE BR_TC = '03') /*전체조합*/
AND A.BR_C = '001' /*중앙회*/
AND A.BR_C IN (SELECT BR_C FROM TTL_BR_C_INFO WHERE BLNG_HQ_BR_C = #{BR_C}) /*도지회별합산*/
AND A.BR_C IN (SELECT BR_C FROM TTL_BR_C_INFO WHERE MO_BR_C = #{BR_C}) /*단위조합별조회(지소포함)*/
AND A.BR_C = #{BR_C}
GROUP BY A.ORG_CLAS_C , A.ACCT_C /*계정코드*/
, A.AC_BUSI_TC /*회계사업구분코드*/
, A.RATE_SSTV_YN /*금리민감여부*/ , A.RATE_SNRO_NO /*금리시나리오번호*/
, A.${DIMENSION1}
, A.${DIMENSION2}
) GROUP BY ORG_CLAS_C /*기관분류코드 */ , ACCT_C /*계정코드 */ , AC_BUSI_TC /*회계사업구분코드 */ , RATE_SSTV_YN /*금리민감여부 */
, DIMENSION1
, DIMENSION2
) SELECT LVL1 AS L1_NM
, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM), 1, LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM) AS RATE_SSTV_NM , GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1) AS GRP_ID , CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1), 1, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), DIMENSION1) WHEN LVL1 = '부채' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1), 1, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), DIMENSION1) ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1), 1, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', DIMENSION1) END AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM), 1, LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM) AS RATE_SSTV_NM , GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2) AS GRP_ID , CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), DIMENSION1) WHEN LVL1 = '부채' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), DIMENSION1) ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', DIMENSION1) END AS DIMENSION1 , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 1, DIMENSION1||' 소계', DIMENSION2) AS DIMENSION2
, CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' AND RATE_SSTV_NM='금리부' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM), 0, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), RATE_SSTV_NM||' 합계') WHEN LVL1 = '부채' AND RATE_SSTV_NM='금리부' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM), 0, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), RATE_SSTV_NM||' 합계') ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM), 1, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM||' 합계') END AS RATE_SSTV_NM , GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM) AS GRP_ID , NULL AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2), 3, LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM) AS RATE_SSTV_NM , CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2), 1, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), LVL2) WHEN LVL1 = '부채' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2), 1, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), LVL2) ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2), 1, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', LVL2) END AS L2_NM
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, DIMENSION1) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, DIMENSION1), 1, LVL2||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, LVL2||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 1, DIMENSION1||' 소계', DIMENSION2) AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2) AS GRP_ID , NULL AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3), 7, LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM) AS RATE_SSTV_NM , CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3), 3, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), LVL2) WHEN LVL1 = '부채' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3), 3, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), LVL2) ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3), 3, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', LVL2) END AS L2_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3), 1, LVL2||' 소계', LVL3) AS L3_NM
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, DIMENSION1) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, DIMENSION1), 1, LVL3||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, LVL3||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 1, DIMENSION1||' 소계', DIMENSION2) AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3) AS GRP_ID , NULL AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4), 15, LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM) AS RATE_SSTV_NM , CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4), 7, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), LVL2) WHEN LVL1 = '부채' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4), 7, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), LVL2) ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4), 7, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', LVL2) END AS L2_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4), 3, LVL2||' 소계', LVL3) AS L3_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4), 1, LVL3||' 소계', LVL4) AS L4_NM
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, DIMENSION1) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, DIMENSION1), 1, LVL4||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, LVL4||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 1, DIMENSION1||' 소계', DIMENSION2) AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4) AS GRP_ID , NULL AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5), 31, LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM) AS RATE_SSTV_NM , CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5), 15, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), LVL2) WHEN LVL1 = '부채' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5), 15, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), LVL2) ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5), 15, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', LVL2) END AS L2_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5), 7, LVL2||' 소계', LVL3) AS L3_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5), 3, LVL3||' 소계', LVL4) AS L4_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5), 1, LVL4||' 소계', LVL5) AS L5_NM
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, DIMENSION1) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, DIMENSION1), 1, LVL5||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, LVL5||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 1, DIMENSION1||' 소계', DIMENSION2) AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5) AS GRP_ID , NULL AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6), 63, LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM) AS RATE_SSTV_NM , CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6), 31, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), LVL2) WHEN LVL1 = '부채' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6), 31, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), LVL2) ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6), 31, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', LVL2) END AS L2_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6), 15, LVL2||' 소계', LVL3) AS L3_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6), 7, LVL3||' 소계', LVL4) AS L4_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6), 3, LVL4||' 소계', LVL5) AS L5_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6), 1, LVL5||' 소계', LVL6) AS L6_NM
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, DIMENSION1) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, DIMENSION1), 1, LVL6||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, LVL6||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 1, DIMENSION1||' 소계', DIMENSION2) AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6) AS GRP_ID , NULL AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 127, LVL1||' 합계', RATE_SSTV_NM) AS RATE_SSTV_NM , CASE WHEN LVL1 = '자산' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 63, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(A)', ' 합계'), LVL2) WHEN LVL1 = '부채' THEN DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 63, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||DECODE(RATE_SSTV_NM, '금리부', ' 합계(B)', ' 합계'), LVL2) ELSE DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 63, RATE_SSTV_NM||LVL1||' 합계', LVL2) END AS L2_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 31, LVL2||' 소계', LVL3) AS L3_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 15, LVL3||' 소계', LVL4) AS L4_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 7, LVL4||' 소계', LVL5) AS L5_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 3, LVL5||' 소계', LVL6) AS L6_NM , DECODE(GROUPING_ID(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7), 1, LVL6||' 소계', LVL7) AS L7_NM
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7, DIMENSION1) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7, DIMENSION1), 1, LVL7||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2) AS GRP_ID , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 3, LVL7||' 소계', DIMENSION1) AS DIMENSION1 , DECODE(GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2), 1, DIMENSION1||' 소계', DIMENSION2) AS DIMENSION2
, GROUPING_ID (RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7) AS GRP_ID , NULL AS DIMENSION1 , NULL AS DIMENSION2
, CASE WHEN SUM(AMT_1) != 0 THEN ROUND(SUM(AMT_1) / TO_NUMBER(#{AMT_UNIT})) END AS AMT_1 /*Flat */ , CASE WHEN SUM(AMT_2) != 0 THEN ROUND(SUM(AMT_2) / TO_NUMBER(#{AMT_UNIT})) END AS AMT_2 /*평행이동_UP_100 */ , CASE WHEN SUM(AMT_3) != 0 THEN ROUND(SUM(AMT_3) / TO_NUMBER(#{AMT_UNIT})) END AS AMT_3 /*평행이동_DOWN_100 */ , CASE WHEN SUM(AMT_4) != 0 THEN ROUND(SUM(AMT_4) / TO_NUMBER(#{AMT_UNIT})) END AS AMT_4 /*탄성치_UP_100 */ , CASE WHEN SUM(AMT_5) != 0 THEN ROUND(SUM(AMT_5) / TO_NUMBER(#{AMT_UNIT})) END AS AMT_5 /*탄성치_DOWN_100 */ , CASE WHEN SUM(AMT_13) != 0 THEN ROUND(SUM(AMT_13) / TO_NUMBER(#{AMT_UNIT})) END AS AMT_13 /*통계예측 */ FROM ( SELECT B.LVL1 , A.RATE_SSTV_NM , B.LVL2 , B.LVL3 , B.LVL4 , B.LVL5 , B.LVL6 , B.LVL7 , B.ACCT_C_NM , AMT_1 /*Flat */ , AMT_2 /*평행이동_UP_100 */ , AMT_3 /*평행이동_DOWN_100 */ , AMT_4 /*탄성치_UP_100 */ , AMT_5 /*탄성치_DOWN_100 */ , AMT_13 /*통계예측 */ , B.PRNT_ORD1 , B.PRNT_ORD2 , B.PRNT_ORD3 , B.PRNT_ORD4 , B.PRNT_ORD5 , B.PRNT_ORD6 , B.PRNT_ORD7
, A.DIMENSION1 AS PRNT_ORD8 , NVL(B1.DIMS_CDNM, '-') AS DIMENSION1
, A.DIMENSION2 AS PRNT_ORD9 , NVL(B2.DIMS_CDNM, '-') AS DIMENSION2
FROM TEMP A , ( SELECT LEVEL , BASE_DATE , SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(ACCT_C_NM), '%') AS ACCT_PATH , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(ACCT_C_NM), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 1 ) AS LVL1 , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(ACCT_C_NM), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 2 ) AS LVL2 , REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(ACCT_C_NM), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 3 ) AS LVL3 , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(ACCT_C_NM), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 4 ),TRIM(ACCT_C_NM)) AS LVL4 , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(ACCT_C_NM), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 5 ),TRIM(ACCT_C_NM)) AS LVL5 , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(ACCT_C_NM), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 6 ),TRIM(ACCT_C_NM)) AS LVL6 , NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(ACCT_C_NM), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 7 ),TRIM(ACCT_C_NM)) AS LVL7 , TRIM(ACCT_C_NM) AS ACCT_C_NM , ORG_CLAS_C , AC_BUSI_TC , ACCT_C , TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(PRNT_ORD), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 1 ) ) AS PRNT_ORD1 , TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(PRNT_ORD), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 2 ) ) AS PRNT_ORD2 , TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(PRNT_ORD), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 3 ) ) AS PRNT_ORD3 , TO_NUMBER(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(PRNT_ORD), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 4 ),TRIM(PRNT_ORD))) AS PRNT_ORD4 , TO_NUMBER(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(PRNT_ORD), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 5 ),TRIM(PRNT_ORD))) AS PRNT_ORD5 , TO_NUMBER(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(PRNT_ORD), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 6 ),TRIM(PRNT_ORD))) AS PRNT_ORD6 , TO_NUMBER(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(TRIM(PRNT_ORD), '%'),'[^%]+' , 1 , 7 ),TRIM(PRNT_ORD))) AS PRNT_ORD7 FROM TSY_ACCT_MSTR_MNG WHERE BASE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(BASE_DATE) FROM TSY_ACCT_MSTR_MNG WHERE BASE_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{BASE_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDD')), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND ORG_CLAS_C = #{ORG_CLAS_C}
AND AC_BUSI_TC = #{AC_BUSI_TC}
AND AC_BUSI_TC = '1105' /*중앙회, 전체합산 조인용*/
START WITH UP_ACCT_C = '0000000' CONNECT BY PRIOR ACCT_C = UP_ACCT_C AND PRIOR BASE_DATE = BASE_DATE AND PRIOR ORG_CLAS_C = ORG_CLAS_C AND PRIOR AC_BUSI_TC = AC_BUSI_TC ) B
, TSY_DIMS_ITEM_MNG B1
, TSY_DIMS_ITEM_MNG B2
WHERE B.ACCT_C = A.ACCT_C AND B.AC_BUSI_TC = A.AC_BUSI_TC AND B.ORG_CLAS_C = A.ORG_CLAS_C
AND B1.DIMS_ITEM_NO(+) = TO_NUMBER(#{DIMENSION1_NUM}) AND B1.DIMS_C_VAL(+) = A.DIMENSION1
AND B2.DIMS_ITEM_NO(+) = TO_NUMBER(#{DIMENSION2_NUM}) AND B2.DIMS_C_VAL(+) = A.DIMENSION2
) GROUP BY LVL1
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, DIMENSION1)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, DIMENSION1)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, DIMENSION1)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, DIMENSION1)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, DIMENSION1)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7, DIMENSION1)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2)
, ROLLUP(RATE_SSTV_NM, LVL2, LVL3, LVL4, LVL5, LVL6, LVL7)
ORDER BY MAX(PRNT_ORD1) , CASE WHEN RATE_SSTV_NM LIKE '금리%' THEN 1 WHEN RATE_SSTV_NM LIKE '비금리%' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END
, MAX(PRNT_ORD2)
, MAX(PRNT_ORD2) , MAX(PRNT_ORD3)
, MAX(PRNT_ORD2) , MAX(PRNT_ORD3) , MAX(PRNT_ORD4)
, MAX(PRNT_ORD2) , MAX(PRNT_ORD3) , MAX(PRNT_ORD4) , MAX(PRNT_ORD5)
, MAX(PRNT_ORD2) , MAX(PRNT_ORD3) , MAX(PRNT_ORD4) , MAX(PRNT_ORD5) , MAX(PRNT_ORD6)
, MAX(PRNT_ORD2) , MAX(PRNT_ORD3) , MAX(PRNT_ORD4) , MAX(PRNT_ORD5) , MAX(PRNT_ORD6) , MAX(PRNT_ORD7)
, MAX(PRNT_ORD8)
, MAX(PRNT_ORD9)
, GRP_ID
